name: Dark Patterns
description:
Oh no! Your soul has been trapped into the Internet by the malicient dark patterns hidden on your favorite website! Learn how dark patterns work while trying to escape them on this 2D pixel dungeon crawler. 

A game made for "Designing games for impact" in University of Miami. Winner game of the Interactive Media Annual Showcase 2022 of the same university. Created by Max Baldwin, Irene Caballero, Emilie Duran and Paulina Fiore.

Project's website: https://dark-patterns-b50b51.webflow.io/?classId=185d7d17-af95-477a-b8bc-8582202...
